availableRoles.fontHeading: Virufy is entirely run by volunteers and pro bono partner companies. Join our fast-paced, mission-driven team to put your skills to use in curbing the spread of the pandemic globally.
availableRoles.fontheadingBold: Got what it takes? Check out opportunities below!

topFold.joinTitle: Join the fight to stop COVID
topFold.details:
We welcome passionate individuals of all backgrounds and experience to help us in ending COVID-19.

Whether you’re a humanitarian, expert or simply eager to make an impact, there’s a multitude of ways to get involved with Virufy’s mission.

donate.title: Make a donation
donate.details:
Donate now to help Virufy perform its vital work of bringing fast and free disease detection to all.

Every bit helps — we couldn’t do it without the financial support of contributors like you.

shareCough.title: Share your cough
shareCough.details: Donate your cough in our study help refine our AI’s predictive ability to recognize COVID-19.

contribute.title: Partner with us
contribute.details: We work with medical, technology, government, and other established organizations across the globe to shape and accomplish Virufy’s mission.
contribute.question: Looking to partner?

join.title: Join the Virufighter team
join.details: We’re a fast-paced, mission-driven team combining our unique skills to curb the spread of the pandemic globally. Our volunteers span more than 25 countries, and our work has the potential to impact millions of lives.
join.question: Excited to help out?
